original: @345b ` // stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa las gsungs pa'i smon lam bzhugs//
analyzed: @345b ` // stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa las gsungs pa'i smon lam bzhugs//
translated: The Aspiration Made in the Sūtra Crushing the Great Wheel

original: # // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: # // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels!🔽The splendor of all the buddhas,🔽the splendor of the solitary buddhas,🔽the power of the arhats,🔽all the holders of secret mantra,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid dang // rang rgyal dag gi gzi brjid dang // dgra bcom rnams kyi mthu dag dang // gsang sngags 'dzin pa thams cad dang // sh'a ri'i bu yi shes rab dang // mood gal bu yi rdzu 'phrul dang // ma 'gags pa yi mig dang ni //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid dang // rang rgyal dag gi gzi brjid dang // dgra bcom rnams kyi mthu dag dang // gsang sngags 'dzin pa thams cad dang // sh'a ri'i bu yi shes rab dang // mood gal bu yi rdzu 'phrul dang // ma 'gags pa yi mig dang ni //
translated: the wisdom of Śāriputra,🔽the miraculous powers of Maudgalyāyana,🔽the eyes of Aniruddha,🔽the ascetic qualities of Kāśyapa,🔽the attainments of Kauṇḍinya,🔽the learning of Ānanda,🔽the love of Brahmā,

original: 'od srungs sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang // koondi n+ya'i sngar thob dang // kun dga' bo yi thos pa dang // tshangs pa yi ni byams pa dang // rgya byin gyi ni dbang rnams dang // 'jig rten skyong gi yul rnams dang // dbang phyug chen po'i stobs rnams dang //
analyzed: 'od srungs sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang // koondi n+ya'i sngar thob dang // kun dga' bo yi thos pa dang // tshangs pa yi ni byams pa dang // rgya byin gyi ni dbang rnams dang // 'jig rten skyong gi yul rnams dang // dbang phyug chen po'i stobs rnams dang //
translated: the powers of Indra,🔽the domains of the world guardians,🔽the strengths of Maheśvara,

original: sde dpon rnams kyi mthu dag dang // 'phrog ma'i gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul dang // de dag rnams kyi mthu dang gzis //🔽bdag gi dug ni dug med shog /'phags pa stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa las gsungs pa'i smon @346a * //
analyzed: sde dpon rnams kyi mthu dag dang // 'phrog ma'i gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul dang // de dag rnams kyi mthu dang gzis // bdag gi dug ni dug med shog /'phags pa stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa las gsungs pa'i smon @346a * //
translated: by the power and splendor of all of them,🔽may my poison be neutralized.
This concludes the aspiration prayer taught in the Noble Great Heap of Jewels.
